title: Ahiru no Pekkle no Suieitaikai wa Oosawagi
original_name: アヒルのペックルの水泳大会は大騷ぎ
sinopse: A new boy moves into Pekkle's town, and is trying his hardest to impress Lucy; however, Lucy isn't interested in him. Lucy makes Pekkle out to be a better swimmer than he really is, and the new boy challenges him to a swimming contest.
